name: Entre Nosotros - Within us
description: Entre Nosotros (Within Us) is a supportive, holistic therapeutic community that centers Latine-identified and Spanish-speaking communities. This program fosters inclusive spaces for Latines to access and reclaim holistic healing practices that empower multicultural identities and values. Latine wellness begins with promoting mental health practices through culturally rooted, trauma-informed, and community-based services. Services include: - Support Groups - Newcomer youth groups - Women's groups
